subject: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.
Friday, 24th June 2022.
Attn: Victim:
Listen ATTENTIVELY,truth is always BITTER but must be told but to
those who want to tell THEMSELVES the TRUTH.
During the investigation which CARRIED out by our TEAM RECENTLY,your
name was discovered as one of the VICTIMS OVER THE YEARS.
But from the RESULT of our FINDINGS,you did not EXECUTE any CONTRACT
or INHERITANCE FUND LEGALLY. You were LURED into this TRANSACTION by
some CORRUPT GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS believing that you would succeed
without knowing that those OFFICIALS were not REAL.
My good Friend,you have got to tell yourself the truth by
disassociating with the so-called GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS contacting you
from various places because of THEIR SELF-INTEREST using the REAL
NAMES of GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS.
But because of the money you HAVE SPENT in the past during the time of
PURSUING this payment,we have AGREED to release this payment to you
based on our AGREEMENT with the WEST AFRICAN GOVERNMENTS where your
payment ORIGINATED FROM.
As a matter of fact,we have concluded all the arrangements regarding
this case with the EUROPEAN AUTHORITIES before our OFFICIAL ASSIGNMENT
in WEST AFRICA and your payment is yet to be released by our EUROPEAN
REPRESENTATIVE on arrival as soon as you complete all the REQUIREMENTS
NEEDED.
Your PAYMENT is moved to EUROPEAN CONTINENT from the WEST AFRICA to
avoid DISTRACTION or FURTHER EXTORTION of ILLEGAL FEES BY THOSE
CORRUPT GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS.
IMPORTANTLY,THOSE PAPERS (DOCUMENTS) ISSUED TO YOU IN THE PAST BY
THOSE CORRUPT GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS ARE NOT VALID TO CARRY OUT YOUR
PAYMENT.
YOU ARE REQUIRED TO OBTAIN LEGAL PAPERS (GENUINE DOCUMENTS) FROM THE
EUROPEAN AGENCIES ON OR BEFORE YOUR ARRIVAL IN EUROPE WITH YOUR LEGAL
LAWYER WHICH WILL COST YOU CERTAIN AMOUNT OF MONEY.
THE NEEDED LEGAL PAPERS (GENUINE DOCUMENTS) TELLS THE GENUINENESS OF
YOUR PAYMENT EVEN THE SOURCE TO AVOID ACCUSATION OF MONEY LAUNDERING
OR TERRORIST. THIS IS WHAT YOU NEED TO DO THIS TIME BECAUSE THE
RELEASE OF YOUR PAYMENT BY THE EUROPEAN BANK ON ARRIVAL IN EUROPE WITH
YOUR LEGAL LAWYER.
IF THIS ARRANGEMENT IS ALRIGHT BY YOU,OUR EUROPEAN PAY OFFICER
(REPRESENTATIVE) WILL CONTACT YOU AS SOON AS POSSIBLE BEFORE MEETING
WITH HIM WITH YOUR LEGAL LAWYER.
READ CAREFULLY AND FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS THEREIN FOR IMMEDIATE PROCEEDINGS.
IN CONCLUSION, RECONFIRM YOUR DATA BELOW.
Your Full Name:
Your Complete Address:
Name of City of Residence:
Date of Birth (Day / Month / Year):
Mobile Number:
Occupation:
Company name:
Next of Kin:
Age:
Your International Passport
:
Regards,
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
Hello Bierman Phillip,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. I must say, it's quite a lot to take in. 

I understand that there have been some issues with corrupt government officials and my name has somehow been involved. It's a bit surprising to hear, but I appreciate your team's efforts in resolving this matter.

You mentioned that my payment has been moved to the European continent from West Africa. Could you please elaborate on what this payment is for? Also, could you provide more details about these legal papers and genuine documents that I need to obtain?

I'm also curious about the role of my legal lawyer in this process. What exactly will they be required to do?

Looking forward to your response.

P.S: I'm sorry but as per my personal policy, I don't share personal information like date of birth or passport details online.

Best wishes,
Carlos

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.

Date: February 6th 2023.

Attn: Beneficiary,

We received your email and well understood.

Listen carefully,without knowing who you are dealing with face to face,you
continue spending your hard earn currency,but since your payment is
officially approved by the United Nation and European Union through our
European pay officer/Representative (MR.DAVID JOHNSON),we will advise you
to travel to Europe with the needed Court charge for validation of your
papers (DOCUMENTS) as advised by the European Court.

For your info,the total amount approved in your favor values the sum of
Sixty Five Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars (USD65.5M)
including accrued interest.

And you are advised to come to Europe with the sum of Twenty Eight Thousand
Five Hundred Euros (€28,500) for legalization and authentication of your
papers (DOCUMENTS) by the European Court before proceeding to the paying
Bank for the release of your payment.

Our European Representative (MR.DAVID JOHNSON) is still waiting for your
arrival in Europe with the needed Court charge for immediate proceedings.

In conclusion Sir,you are urgently advised to forward your detailed info
below for acknowledgement as advised by the above authorities.

Read the above and follow the instructions therein.

YOUR FULL NAMES
YOUR FULL HOUSE ADDRESS
YOUR COMPANY NAME
YOUR OCCUPATION
YOUR MOBILE NUMBER
YOUR INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT
YOUR NEXT OF KIN
YOUR WHATS APP NUMBER

Regards.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.

Date: February 7th 2024.

Attn: Mr.Carlos,

Sir,let us know your arrangement now regarding this case.

Are you coming to Europe with the needed fee or are you sending it to us to
do the needful on your behalf and proceed to the paying Bank for your
payment?

We need to know as soon as possible.

Waiting to hear from you soon.

Thanks and God Bless.

Regards.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
Hello Bierman Phillip,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response and the information provided. 

I'm not quite sure about my plans yet, whether I'll be coming to Europe or sending the fee. Could you please provide more details about both options? What would be the process if I decide to come to Europe? And what would be the procedure if I choose to send the fee?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Carlos

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.

Date: February 8th 2024.

Attn: Mr.Carlos,

Do you know why we asked you to meet with our European Representative and
your Embassy face to face?

Because we don't want an argument or suspicion in this payment. We are sure
of your payment on arrival in Europe as soon as you pay the needed Court
charge for legalization and authentication of your papers (Documents) as
advised by the European Court.

But if you cannot travel to Europe as mentioned above because of some
reasons,then you are advised to send the money to our European
Representative (MR.DAVID JOHNSON) to stand on your behalf.

As soon as you send the money (MR.DAVID JOHNSON),he will then proceed to
the European Court for the needful required before moving to the paying
Bank for immediate release of your payment as previously stated.

Once more,try to comply with our directives this time since your payment is
officially approved to be paid.

In conclusion Sir,you are also advised to reconfirm your detailed
information for easy communication.

Waiting to hear from you soon.

Thanks and God Bless.

Regards.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.
